definitions.definition: A person, usually a young, attractive female, who encourages applause and cheers at a sports event , and wearing a specially-designed uniform in the official colors of the team he/she cheers for.
A person who rallies support for any cause.

main_definition: ( chiefly US ) A person, usually a young, attractive female, who encourages applause and cheers at a sports event , and wearing a specially-designed uniform in the official colors of the team he/she cheers for.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A person who rallies support for any cause.
